This is her second loan through Kiva and she is very grateful for it and determined to get ahead.  She is requesting 4,000 PEN to buy goods such as rice, sugar, sodas, vegetables and canned foods.

loans.use: To buy goods such as rice, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.en: Cirilo earns a living through his sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in his place in Maribojoc, Bohol. Cirilo is asking for a loan to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, sugar, cooking oil and seasonings, soap and detergents, soda and beverages. Through this, he will be able to improve his store and attract more customers in his store thus augmenting his sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, sugar, cooking oil and seasonings, soap and detergents, soda and beverages

loans.name: Darwin

texts.en: Darwin is a 53 year old married man and a father of four children from Maribojoc, Bohol. He is engaged in hog raising business for more than a year now. This is the source of his income. Darwin is asking for a loan to buy feeds for the pigs. Through this, he will be able to improve his business and augment his income.

loans.use: to buy feeds for the pigs

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Trabajadoras está en su ciclo número 2º del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que luchan y decidieron tomar el mando para poder luchar por sus seres queridos.
Edith es una de las integrantes de este grupo, quien se dedica a la venta de bebidas en general, ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que lucha por salir adelante y cada día ir creciendo. Edith suena con algún día poder tener un local grande donde poder ofrecer a sus clientes todo lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de vinos, cervezas, gaseosas, y demás para poder seguir con sus ventas y crecer en su microempresa.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Mujeres Trabajadoras" is in its second women's committe loan cycle.  All of the members are struggling heads of household who decided to take the reins and fight for their loved ones.

Edith is one of the members and her business is selling beverages in general.  She is a hard-working person who struggles to get ahead and grow every day.  Edith dreams of one day having a large store where she can offer her customers everything they need.  She is requesting a loan to buy wine, beer, sodas and other goods so she can continue with her sales and grow as a small business owner.

loans.use: To buy wine, beer, sodas and other goods.

loans.name: Kervin Kharlaig

texts.es:
Kervin es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar para ayudar a sus padres, kervin no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas que desea, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Mariscos para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Kervin trabaja como operario de inventario en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Kervin se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de abarrotes, como arroz, azúcar, menestras, bebidas y otros, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder iniciar en su hogar un pequeño negocio  de venta de abarrotes, de esta manera Kervin podrá obtener mayores ingresos económicos, los mismo que utilizara para poder estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Kervin, 20, is single and lives in the city of Pisco with his parents and siblings.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person with a great desire to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to work to help his parents, Kervin was unable to get a Business Administration degree as he would have liked.  In his free time he enjoys sports and sometimes cooks a delicious seafood rice to share with family.

On his own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Kervin works as an inventory operator for a sales company in his city.  He works an average ten hours a day and believes things are going well for him because he is kind to others.

Kervin is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help he will be able to buy groceries such as rice, sugar, vegetables, beverages and other items so he can start a small business in his home, a grocery store.  He wants to earn extra income to pay for his university studies.

loans.use: To buy groceries.

loans.name: Damas Unidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Damas Unidas está en su ciclo número 1º del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas, y ven una gran oportunidad en este programa, decidieron esforzarse por salir adelante y ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Lucia, es parte de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles, comenta que con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación está saliendo adelante y gracias al trabajo que ella hace. Lucia también dice que sus comidas son muy ricas y que por eso le está yendo muy bien.
Ella solicita este crédito para la compra de verduras, carnes, condimentos, huevos, harina y demás, con lo cual quiere seguir haciendo sus alimentos para tener así los ingresos para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The "Damas Unidas" group is on its first cycle as part of the women's committee programme.  The women are learning to work together and they can see that this programme is a great opportunity for them.  They have decided to put in the effort to move forward in life and to help each other.

Lucia is part of this group and she makes a living selling hot meals.  She tells us that with a lot of effort and dedication she is prospering thanks to her work.  Lucia also says that her meals are delicious and that that is why things are going very well for her.

Lucia is applying for a loan in order to buy vegetables, meats, condiments, eggs, flour and more.  With it, she can continue preparing her meals and continue bringing in an income to help her family.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meats, condiments, eggs, flour and more.

loans.name: Edita

texts.en:
Edita is a 59 year old married woman and a mother of 2 children from Loon, Bohol. Edita is engaged in hog raising business for more than 15 years now. This is the source of her income. 
Edita is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and feeds. Through this loan, she will be able to improve her hog raising business and makes it a success .

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and feeds

loans.name: Lean

texts.en: Lean earns a living through her hog raising business in her place in Loon, Bohol. She is engaged in this business for more than 6 years now. This is the source of her income. Lean is asking for a loan to buy feeds for the pigs. Through this, she will be able to improve her business and makes it a success.

loans.use: to buy feeds for the pigs

loans.name: Jorge Guillermo

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 22 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Jorge pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Verde para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jorge trabaja como asesor de servicios en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea tarrajear la fachada de su casa, ya que esta se encuentra un poco deteriorada y no tiene buen aspecto, de esta manera Jorge y su familia tendrán mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia casa y familia.
texts.en:
Jorge, 22, is single and lives in the city of Cañete, district of Imperial, with his parents and siblings.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person with a great desire to get ahead.  Thanks to his own efforts and support from his parents, Jorge was able to get an accounting degree.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer with friends and sometimes cooks a delicious green rice to share with family.

On his own initiative and with much hard work and dedication, Jorge works as a services consultant for a sales company in his city.  He works an average ten hours a day and believes things are going well for him because of his kindness to others.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help he will be able to renovate his home.  He wants to cover the outside walls of his house because it is in disrepair and does not look good.  This will give Jorge and his family added safety and well being, allowing him to continue working and striving toward his goal of having his own house and family one day.

loans.use: To renovate his house.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
Mujeres Unidas es de la Ciudad de San Pedro,  tiene 14 integrantes, todas ellas mujeres luchadoras que desean poder ayudar a sus familias a salir adelante y darles todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
La señora Crecencia es una señora muy trabajadora que empezó apenas teniendo un cerdo y unas pocas gallinas, actualmente y gracias al esfuerzo que está haciendo pudo ir creciendo y tener mayor cantidad de animales.
El crédito solicitado a la Fundación Paraguaya lo quiere invertir en la compra de cerdos para poder criarlos y también para faenarlos y venderlos. Agradece por esta oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras están recibiendo ya que de esa forma podrán seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The 'Mujeres Unidas' group is from the city of San Pedro.  It has 14 members who are all hard-working women who want to be able to help their families to make progress and give them everything they couldn't have.

Crecencia is a very hard-working woman who has recently started keeping a pig and a few hens.  Thanks to the efforts she is making, she is able to grow her business and acquire a larger number of animals.

Crecencia is requesting a loan from Fundación Paraguaya to invest in buying pigs to raise, slaughter and sell.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her fellow group members are receiving as it will enable them to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise and slaughter

loans.name: Marlen Patricia

texts.es: Marlen Patricia, tiene la edad de 21 años, es soltera, y no tiene hijos. Ella quiere  comprar alimento para cerdos, los cuales los tiene en propiedad de su padre.   Tiene varios años que se dedica a esta actividad y quiere crecer económicamente y ayudarle a su padre  y poder estudiar. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. No  ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más
texts.en:
Marlen Patricia, 21, is single and does not have children. She wants to buy feed for some pigs she raises in her father’s property. She has been doing this for some years and wants to grow economically, help her father and study.

This is Marlen Patricia’s first loan with FUDECOSUR. She has not had other loans with state banks or cooperatives before, but FUDECOSUR granted her a loan more easily and with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy feed for pigs.

loans.name: Johnna Mae

texts.en:
Johnna Mae of Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, is a 24-year-old married woman with two children. To make a living, she owns and operates a service-based motor transport business. She has operated this business for three years and earns 30,000 PHP a month. 

In order to fully pay for her existing vehicle, Johnna Mae has requested to borrow 20,000 PHP from GDMPC. She has been a member of GDMPC since the year 2012. 

In the future, Johnna Mae plans to expand her business by improving the service that she offers.

loans.use: to fully pay for her motorcycle for her transport business.

loans.name: Celia

texts.en: Celia is 49 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, with her husband and three children. For the last six years, she has earned a living by selling snacks. She earns PHP 3,500 a month. To buy ingredients and additional kitchen wares to be used for the business, she is now requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 from GDMPC. Celia hopes to use the additional income she earns to expand her business and save money for the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and additional kitchen wares to be used for her business.

loans.name: Virgilda

texts.en:
Virgilda, a mother of one child, is from Mahayahay, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 35 years old.  

Virgilda owns and operates a business venture, raising pigs for sale. She's been in this business for five years.  Each month, she earns PHP 1,500 doing this type of business.  

She has requested 3,000 PHP to purchase piglets to raise and sell in the future. In 2009, Virgilda joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation.  

In the future, Virgilda plans to make improvements to her house and also improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Ampila

texts.en:
Ampila is from Aurora, Zamboang del Sur. She is 40 years old and married with four children. She has sold charcoal in the market for four years and earns 4,000 PHP a month from this business. 

In 2010, Ampila joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services. To purchase additional coco shells to produce more charcoal for sale, she has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP. 

In the future, Ampila wants to expand her business so that she can offer employment opportunities to the community.

loans.use: To purchase additional coco shells to produce more charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
Erma is married and has three children. She is 51 years old and resides in Gubaan, Aurora. Erma operates her own farm, planting and harvesting corn for sale to earn a living. 

Aside from farming, she also has a service-based business sewing different kinds of clothing and curtains. She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase assorted materials to be used for sewing.

In the future, Erma wants to make improvements to her house and also to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase assorted materials to be used for sewing.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es: Rodolfo, tiene la edad de 47 años, es casado, y tiene 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El quiere  comprar abono e insumos para asistir  cafetal que es de su propiedad.   Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer y también desea que su finca sea muy productiva. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. No  ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. El  también tiene el deseo de brindarle a sus hijos la educación necesaria  para que sean en el futuro  personas preparadas y puedan enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is 47 years old, married, and has two children who are his main priority in life.  He would like to buy manure and inputs for the coffee farm that he owns.  Rodolfo has been working on his farm for a number of years.  He would like to grow his business and would also like his farm to be very productive.

This is the first loan that Rodolfo has received from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't received any loans from state banks or cooperatives in the past but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.  Rodolfo would like to provide his children with the education they need so that, in the future, they are educated and able to face life more easily than their father.

loans.use: to buy manure and inputs for growing coffee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plant vegetables.

loans.name: Damian

texts.en:
Damian is married with five children. Damian is forty years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines.

Damian provides transportation services to local community members to earn a living. He has been doing this for three years and every month he earns 6,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 3,000 PHP to purchase a new set of tires.

Damian has been a member of GDMPC since 2011. In the future, Damian hopes to support his children to finish studying, and to double the income from his business.

loans.use: to purchase a new set of tires

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is a 49-year old resident of Anonang, Aurora. Fe provides for her three children's well-being from the small amount of 8,000 PHP she earns each month from her own piggery. She has maintained this business for five years to supplement the income that her husband earns. 


In 2012,  she became a member of GDMPC.  Recently, she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase piglets to raise. Fe wants to expand her piggery to increase their income and to have a general better living condition.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to raise

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en casa en anticretico, en la zona de Villa Bolívar de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente trabaja como Empleado  en una empresa  en la ciudad de El Alto percibiendo un salario mensual como contador. 
El crédito lo requiere realizar un curso de actualización para contabilidad y así poder mejorar sus conocimientos y tratar de mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Juan Gualberto es tener su casa propia  y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Juan is single and has no children. He lives in a mortgaged house in the area of Villa Bolívar in the city of El Alto. Right now he is working as an employee for a business in the city of  El Alto, receiving a monthly salary as an accountant. He needs the loan to do a continuing education class for accounting and thus improve his knowledge and try to increase his income. 

Juan Gualberto's dream is to own his own home and thus improve his quality of life. This is the fourth time he has asked for a loan from IMPRO and the second time from KIVA.

loans.use: to pay for a continuing education course for accounting.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo es separado y tiene dos hijos una niña en etapa escolar y su hijo mayor que está en la universidad; viven en casa en alquiler, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona  Rosas Pampa de la ciudad de El Alto.
Gerardo estudió hasta el nivel secundario y ahora trabaja de forma independiente con su movilidad en la urbe alteña, en transporte de pasajeros.
El crédito lo requiere para  el mantenimiento de su movilidad y la compra de llantas nuevas, ya que es su principal herramienta de trabajo.
El sueño de Gerardo es tener una casa propia.
Es la primera  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Gerardo is separated and has two children: a daughter who is in school and an older son who is in college.  They live together in a rental house in Rosas Pampa neighborhood, in the city of El Alto.  Gerardo studied up to high school level and now works independently with his vehicle in the city of El Alto, transporting passengers.

Gerardo needs this loan to have his taxi serviced and to buy new tires for it as it is his main work tool.

Gerardo's dream is to own his own home.  This is his first loan from IMPRO and also his first loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to have his taxi serviced and to buy tires for it

loans.name: Dennis

texts.es:
Dennis es soltero y no tiene  hijos, vive en casa de  sus abuelos, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona  rio seco  de la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudio hasta el nivel secundario, el vende mermeladas en las distintas ferias de la ciudad  El Alto
El crédito lo requiere para  adquirir en mayor cantidad  mermeladas, así poder ofrecer a su clientela una gran variedad de sabores en sus productos, además de rebajar sus costos al comprar en cantidad.
El sueño de Dennis es convertirse en proveedor mayorista.
Es la primera  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Dennis is single and has no children. He lives in his grandparent's house. The house is located in the Rio Seco area in the city of El Alto. He went to school up to the secondary level and sells jam at different markets in the city of El Alto.

He needs the loan to acquire a larger quantity of jams. This way he can offer his customers a wide variety of flavors with his products as well as lower the costs by buying wholesale. Dennis' dream is to become a wholesale supplier.

This is the first time that he has asked IMPRO and Kiva for a loan.

loans.use: to buy different flavored jams to offer his customers.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 53 years old and lives in Ospital, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children.

Myrna has a store that sells variety of products:  soft drinks, cooking oils, bread, biscuits, candies and many others.  She has had this business for five years.  She has requested a loan of 10,000 pesos to buy additional inventory for sale.

Myrna has been a member of PMPC for 4 years.  In the future, Myrna hopes to own a house and lot.

loans.use: to buy additional inventory for sale.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis es viudo y  tiene cinco hijos; vive con una de sus hijas y su nieta, viven en casa en casa en alquiler, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Villa Esperanza de la ciudad de El Alto.
El  estudio hasta el nivel primario, actualmente trabaja como chofer asalariado.
El crédito lo requiere para cubrir los gastos médicos ya que el necesita una intervención quirúrgica (operación de próstata).
El sueño de Luis es tener  una movilidad propia pero para eso debe tener estable su salud
Es la segunda  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Luis is a widower and has five children.  He lives with one of his daughters and his granddaughter.  They live in a rental house which is located in the Villa Esperanza area of the city of El Alto.

Luis has an elementary school education and currently works as a salaried driver.

Luis needs this loan to cover some medical expenses as he needs an operation (on his prostate).

Luis' dream is to own his own vehicle but, in order to realize this dream, he must first get his health stable.

This is the second time that Luis has requested a loan from IMPRO and the second time from Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for an operation on his prostate

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is from Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines.  She is 47 years old and married.  Lydia has four grown children.  Lydia owns and operates a retail store buying and selling charcoal. 

Lydia has been able to manage the specialized retail store well and she has been in this business for about five years.  Each month she earns PHP 12,000 from her business undertakings.   Now, She is requesting an amount  of PHP 25,000 to purchase rice and corn grits in addition to her working inventory capital. 

Lydia plans to use her newly generated revenue from the business to add to her working capital to expand her business.

In the future, she wants to renovate her house to improve the living conditions for the entire family.

loans.use: to purchase rice and corn grits in addition to her working inventory capital

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María tiene 60 años de edad, es viuda y tiene seis hijos de los cuales cuatro viven con ella. Ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace aproximadamente 24 años y a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 7. Los cultivos los realiza junto a sus hijos, siembran maíz. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar fertilizantes para cultivar 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz y tres cerdos para engórdalos y posteriormente venderlos. Por sus propios medios le es difícil ahorrar para cultivar y comprar esos cerdos ya que tiene escasos recursos económicos. Ella lo que mas desea es continuar trabajando, para construir una galera para mantener ahí los cerdos y que su trabajo sea más efectivo.
texts.en:
María is 60 years old. She is a widow and has six children, four of whom live with her.  She has worked in agriculture for approximately 24 years and has been raising pigs for 7. She grows her crops with her children, planting corn. 

The loan she is asking for from Fundación Campo is to buy fertilizer to plant 10,500 square meters of corn as well as three pigs to fatten up and then sell. It is difficult to save up the money on her own to buy the pigs since she is of low income. What she wants the most is to continue working to build a shed to keep the pigs there so her work will be more efficient.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to plant 10,500 square meters of corn as well as three pigs to fatten up and sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is in her 50's but still has the eagerness to succeed.  She is married and has only one child.  Editha’s husband is a farmer while she is managing a small sari-sari (variety) store in their village.  Her child is already married but still she is working hard to at least help her husband support their daily expenditures. 

She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy additional products such as meat, vegetables and beverages to extend her product offering.  Editha is looking forward to the growth of her business.

loans.use: to buy additional products such as meat, vegetables and beverages

loans.name: Fely

texts.en:
From Nabuna, Aloran, Misamis Occidental lives Fely.  She is 37 years old, married and with 5 children. 
Fely sells different varieties of fish to earn a living and has had this business for 4 years.  She has requested a  PHP 10,000 loan to pay for additional fish for sale.

Fely has been a member of PMPC for 4 years.  In the future, Fely hopes to expand her business and own a stall in the public market.

loans.use: to pay for additional fish for sale

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en: Cristita is a 43-year-old resident of Lantungan, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur.  Cristita provides her child's needs from the little amount of 2,500 PHP that she earns monthly from her own piggery business that she has had for 5 years.  Recently,  she is requesting  an amount of 5,000 PHP to buy more piglets to raise. Cristita wants to expand  her business to have a better living in the future.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise

loans.name: Magdalino

texts.en:
Magdalino of Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur is a 49 year old man, married and has three children.  To make a living he owns and manages a manufacturing business making furniture for sale.  He has been doing this for seven years, earning 15,000 PHP monthly in order to support the needs of his family. 

As a new member of GDMPC micro credit, he is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional material to be used for the furniture business.  He hopes to explore more furniture designs and hopes it will help him expanding his business for a better future.

loans.use: To purchace additional stuff to be used for the furniture business

loans.name: Los Ayllus Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Los Ayllus” en el distrito de Challabamba (En el distrito de Challabamba dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco). Este banco comunal está conformado por varias personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Los socios  se dedican a la agricultura, a la venta de frutas, a la ganadería, a la venta de comestibles, al engorde de ganado, a la ganadería, a la crianza de animales menores y otros. 

Edgar tiene 40 años de edad y tiene tres hijos, él es una persona responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia, él nació en la comunidad de Inquilpata y vive en la misma comunidad de donde nació, él se dedica a la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, maíz y otras cosas, también él se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, él es una persona responsable y sus vecinos no dudaron en invitarle a participar del banco comunal. En esta oportunidad Edgar requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y cuyes. Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Las fotos de las personas que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía pidieron permiso para no estar presentes en la reunión y se les tuvo que buscar en sus domicilios).
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors formed the "Los Ayllus" community bank in Challabamba district (Challabamba district is in Paucartambo province, in Cusco department).  This community bank is made up of a number of people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and, through their daily work, provide their children with a better future.  The members of this group farm, sell fruit, raise livestock, sell food products, fatten cattle, etc.

Edgar is 40 years old and has three children.  He is a responsible and friendly person who provides for his family.  He was born in Inquilpata community and still lives there today.  He is a farmer and has several plots of farmland where he grows potatoes, barley, corn and other crops.  He also raises animals such as guinea pigs and hens.  He is a responsible person and his neighbors didn't hesitate to invite him to join their community bank.  On this occasion, Edgar needs a loan to buy seeds and guinea pigs.  The members of the group are all grateful for the opportunity they are receiving and pledge to make their loan repayments on time.

The smaller photos at the bottom of the main photo are of people who requested permission not to be present at the meeting and it was necessary to go and visit them at home.

loans.use: to buy seeds and guinea pigs

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is single.  A forty-six year old residing in Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines.  To earn a living Joy owns and operates a music bar.  He has been in this business for five years and earns PHP 10,500 from it.  Aside from  the food and drinks they serve, he also offers entertainment service business earning another PHP 15,000 monthly. 

Recently, Joy requested a loan amount of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional CDs, bottled products and a music player set.  In the future, Joy wants to make improvements to his house and to improve his general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional CD, bottled products and music player set .

loans.name: Khosbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Khosbayar, 32 years old, lives with his wife and two daughters in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia.  The family reside in their own house on a plot of land.  He has been operating a small photo studio since 2007 and accumulated a vast amount of experience in this service.  Also he renders copying, printing and scanning services to medical students at the same time.  Using his previous loan, he updated all of his photographic equipment and it helped his work efficiency. 

Now he is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, planks, fiberglass and foam.  Because his house has deteriorated over the years, it needs some serious repair.  After repairing and insulating his house using these materials, the family will reduce its coal consumption, release less pollutants to air and contribute to the efforts against air pollution.  The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga of Aurora, Zamboang del Sur is a 37 year old woman, married with two children.  For three years, she has been earning PHP 5,000 monthly from her own sari sari store selling goods to her locality for a living.  She is faithful in managing her business in order to support her husband. 

In 2011, she became a member of GDMPC where she gains access to financial services. She has requested a loan amount of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional canned goods, bottled products and noodles for sale.  She wants to use the additional revenue as working capital to gain multiple income.

loans.use: To purchase additional canned goods, bottled products and noodles for sale

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en: Myrna and her husband have a transport business.  They are offering tricycle transport in their village. They are generating an income of PHP 200 a day.  To offer excellent service to their valued customers, Myrna is requesting a loan amount of PHP 13,000.  She intends to use the loan for the repair and maintenance of their tricycle.  She is hoping that her requested loan will be granted.

loans.use: for the repair and maintenance of their tricycle

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria, from the city of Puerto Plata, is one of the members taking a housing loan.  This is her 6th loan, which she will use to improve her house.  She has had her business for over four years, having started it with her own capital, selling blankets and quilts.  Her last loan was invested in the business, where she sells used clothes, bed clothing and underwear.

Esperanza Internacional runs a program for their good clients who are reliable in paying back their loans, who have fulfilled their commitment to grow their business, and who have shown fidelity in their groups.  This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time as running their businesses and attending their group meetings.

Maria wants to continue building her house, and with this loan she will change some deteriorated wood walls and the zinc roof with new concrete block walls,  and she will also make a roof with new zinc.  Before she started but she knew she didn't have enough capital to finish.  She is requesting this loan to buy cement, concrete blocks, zinc, and other building materials.  She thanks God, Esperanza Internacional and all of you for this opportunity.  In her name and that of her family, thanks to all of you for your support!

loans.use: To buy cement, concrete blocks, zinc, etc.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Ms Khalida is a married woman. She, along with her husband, is in the business of making artificial jewelery and has been for many years. The business has great potential for growth and Khalida is actively helping her husband as this business is the only source of income for them. She has three children; one of them is going to school. Khalida wishes to send other children to school by trying to increase her earnings to afford educational expenses of her children. In order to meet the orders on time and boost her sales, Khalida requested a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase raw material such as silver, gold and dozens of artificial gems and pearls. She hopes get increase in her earnings and wishes to spend the part of profits on providing quality education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as silver, gold and dozens of artificial gems and pearls.

loans.name: Safia

texts.en: Ms Safia is a 45 year old married woman and a mother of six. She is doing business of tailoring since 12 years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of household with the educational needs of children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Now she requested for a loan of Rs. 25000/- to purchase a new sewing machine along with the packs of threads, buttons and laces in different colors. In this way she will be able to meet with the increasing demand of her customers; her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Safia hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine along with the packs of threads, buttons and laces in different colors.

loans.name: Balqees

texts.en:
Ms Balqees is doing a business of shoe making from the past three years with the support of her husband. The man shown in the photo is Balqees’s husband. During a year of her business she had low capital and was unable to expand her business activities. At that point in time, she was afraid of taking informal loan from relatives so she contacted Kashf foundation upon the suggestion of her neighbor. With the help of loan she brought raw material to inflate her sales of shoes in her community.

Balqees has two children; she is eager to support her family and is liable to fulfill their basic necessities including food, health and education. She is also accountable to improve their standard of living. Through her business she is fulfilling her dreams and able to manage her children’s education. It’s her 2nd year with Kashf Foundation. Now, she requested a loan of Rs. 25,000 to buy additional material of shoes including leather, artificial leather and plastic soles etc. In this way she can handle the growing demand of her shoes in the market and hence can better support her family.

loans.use: to buy additional material of shoes including leather, artificial leather and plastic soles.

loans.name: Noreen

texts.en: Ms Noreen is a 32 year old married woman doing a business of milk sales for the past 4 years. She has 2 cows in milk; she sells its milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to lead her decent life. She is a mother of two and is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life.  It’s her second year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through support of it. Currently she applied a loan of Rs. 30,000 to purchase one more cow. It would help her to inflate her sales which ultimately help in bringing more cash for her

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Kosur

texts.en: Ms Kosur is a 36-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. For the past 12 years, she has been successfully running her business of milk sales. Over the time, Kosur has attained regular list of customers and makes enough to support the needs of the family members.  She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf foundation. Currently she requested a loan of Rs. 35,000 to purchase another buffalo. In this way she would be able to increase her sales which ultimately help in generating more cash. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment behavior. She dreams to provide better standard of living to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Ummay

texts.en: Ms Ummay, age 22, deals in business of milk sales. She has gain two years of experience in this field. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and that she makes from the milk. By the time, she has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She counts a good client list and makes enough to contribute in the family income. She is in her 2nd loan cycle; she requested a loan of Rs. 25,000 to buy a buffalo. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend her profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo.

loans.name: Kaneez

texts.en: Ms Kaneez is a 41 year old married woman and a mother of 3 children. She is motivated to provide all facilities of life to her family. She has been successfully running a general store for the past ten years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Kaneez makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 which she will use to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Farrukh

texts.ru: Фарруху 32 года. Он женат и живет с женой, двумя дочерьми, матерью и сестрой в городе Куляб. Его жена домохозяйка, а мать пенсионерка. Фаррух, чтобы обеспечивать семью в последние годы выезжал в Россию на заработки. Теперь он больше не хочет покидать родину. Фаррух в своем городе намерен заняться услугой такси. У него имеется опыт вождения. Фаррух планирует развозить пассажиров по маршрутной линии город Куляб - город Душанбе. Чтобы начать деятельность, ему необходимо преобрести машину. У него имеется немного сбережения, а оставшуюся часть денег он просит в кредит.
texts.en: Farrukh is 32, married, and lives with his wife, two daughters, mother, and sister in Kulyab. His wife is a homemaker, and his mother is retired. In order to provide for his family, Farrukh has been working in Russia for the last few years. Now he does not want to leave his homeland. He wants to run a private taxi service in his hometown. He is an experienced driver, and plans to take passengers between Kulyab and Dushanbe. To start his business, he needs to get a car. He has some small savings, but is requesting a loan to cover the rest of the cost.

loans.use: to buy a car to operate a taxi service

loans.name: Sadaf

texts.en: Ms Sadaf is 21 years old lady; she is in the business of stitching clothes for a period of about two years.  She is well familiar with the stitching techniques and makes enough to contribute in the family income. She enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity from the people of her community. But due to low cash in hand she in unable to meet the orders of her customers on time. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of Rs. 20,000 to buy a stock of threads in different colors, with the packs buttons and needles. So then she would be able to meet the demands of her customers without fail. She wishes to utilize the part of profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors, with the packs of buttons and needles.

loans.name: Riffat

texts.en: Ms Riffat is 37 years old married woman. Her husband is doing a business of garments but his income is not sufficient to bear the expenses of their five children alone. It was very tough for Riffat to manage her house needs with the small income of her husband. Therefore she decided to help her husband in earning. For this purpose she started her business of cloth trade as she buys cloths of different fabric from the market and after doing stitching sells them to the people of her community. Now she is playing a very important role for her family. To meet the orders of her customers on time she requested a loan of Rs. 20000/- to purchase bundles of cloth with some spools of thread in various colors. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of cloth with some spools of thread in various colors.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Ms Shazia is a 32-year-old energetic lady. She got married when she was only 18 years old. Now she has 4 children; all is school going. Three years ago she started her own business of milk sales with the support of Kashf foundation. Her business is good enough to lead her decent life. To cater more people of her community she needs to purchase another buffalo. For this she requested a loan of Rs. 35,000. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment history. Shazia wishes to generate profit from her business by utilizing this loan amount.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Ms Nazia is a 36-year-old married woman. She has 6 children; she is struggling hard to meet their needs as her husband’s income is not sufficient to run his household alone. That is why five years ago, she initiated her own business of milk sales to contribute in the family income. Now she has 3 cows and 2 buffaloes and sells their milk in her community and in the local market. She earns enough money to fulfill the basic necessity of life. She requested for a loan of Rs. 25000 to buy more cow. She is in her 1st loan cycle and hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to buy more cow.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en: Ms Saima is a 20-year-old lady. For about 6 years she is been in work of hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations, she has requested for a loan of Rs. 15,000 to buy reels of threads in different colors with the packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment. In this way she would be able to cater more customers consistently. She is hopeful to get increase in her income by targeting more customers. Saima desires to build her own house as she is living in a rented house with her family. She is in her 2nd loan cycle and is very much thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors with the packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment.

loans.name: Zarifa

texts.ru: Зарифа молодая замужняя женщина. Ей 25 лет. Она с мужем, дочерью и родителями мужа проживает в районе Спитамен. Ее муж занимается предоставлением услуги такси. Свёкор и свекровь работают учителями в средней школе. Сама Зарифа занимается сельским хозяйством. Сейчас она хотела бы начать бизнес в сфере животноводства. Зарифа запрашивает кредит для купли и продажи крупнорогатого скота. Она планирует закупать по 4-х голов крупнорогатого скота, откармливать их в течение двух месяцев и затем продавать на скотном рынке с наценкой. У нее имеется место для разведения скота. В новом бизнесе ей будет помогать семья. Зарифа очень надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Zarifa is 25, and married. She lives with her husband, daughter, and parents in Spitamen. Her husband operates a private taxi service. Her in-laws are high school teachers. Zarifa herself is involved in farming. Now she would like to start a business in animal husbandry. She is requesting a loan for buying and selling cattle. She is planning to buy four head of cattle, and fatten them for two months, and then sell them on the livestock market at a profit. She has a good place for the cattle. Her family is going to help her with the business, Zarifa is counting heavily on your support.

loans.use: to buy four cows for fattening and later resale

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en: Ms Jamila is a 51-year-old married woman. She has 6 children; two of them are married. She is doing her own business of milk sales for a period of about 30 years. She expended all her life for providing better future to her family. She is getting older but still doing her business with devotion and dedication. She needs money to buy veterinary medicine as some of cows are getting old so she requested for a loan of Rs. 50,000 to purchase feed for her cows with the packs of veterinary medicines. She is in her 9th loan cycle and is one of good clients of Kashf. She expects boost in her earnings through her larger sales.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her cows with the packs of veterinary medicines.

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en: Ms Zareena is a 33-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 5 children. Her husband is employed in a textile mill but his income is not sufficient to meet the increasing demands of his family. Zareena decided to support her husband by doing business herself. For this purpose she started a business of milk sales  with the help of Kashf Foundation. Initially she bought a buffalo with the loan amount. Over the time she has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She counts a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She is in her 5th loan cycle; currently she requested a loan of Rs. 25,000 to purchase one more buffalo. She expects boost in her earnings and plans to spend the part of profits on expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Kouser

texts.en: Ms Kouser is a 40-year-old married woman doing a business of selling milk for the past 6 years. She has two buffaloes and two cows in milk. The only source of earning is her milk production business. She is a mother of 5 children; all is school going. She knows the importance of education and wants to provide education to her children for their bright and prosperous future. She has improved her business to meet day-to-day expenses of life. She is in her 10th loan cycle. Now she requested for a loan of Rs 50,000 to Kashf Foundation to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. She hopes to get increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Seema

texts.en: Ms Seema is a 47-year-old married woman. She has six children. Twenty years ago she started her own business of milk sales to provide financial support to her husband in meeting the needs of the family members. Seema's husband is employed in a textile mill but his income is not sufficient to meet household expenses alone. By the time, Seema has become famous in her area for providing good quality milk. She counts a good client list and makes enough to contribute to her family income. Currently she requested a loan of Rs. 60,000 loan to purchase one more buffalo. She has been in association with Kashf since eight years and has shown excellent repayment behavior. She expects boost in her earnings with her loan and plans to spend the part of profit to meet the growing demands of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Manzar

texts.ru: Манзар молодой и активный парень в возрасте 24 лет. Он пока не женат и не имеет детей. Но он очень любит детей и в скором времени собирается жениться. А сейчас Манзар живёт вместе со своими  родителями. После окончания школы Манзар поступил в педагогическое училище, закончил его и получил профессию учителя. После чего он устроился на работу учителем в колледж, где и работает по сей день. Но зарплата учителя маленькая, и её не хватает на достойное проживание. Поэтому Манзар начал свой маленький бизнес и хочет постепенно его развивать, чтобы этот бизнес приносил хороший доход ему и его семье. Он занимается купля-продажей продуктов питания, для этого у него имеется собственный магазин. Но так как Манзар работает в колледже, он не может всё время находится в магазине. И пока Манзар находится на работе в колледже, в магазине помогает продавать его мама. Сейчас Манзар хочет увеличить ассортимент продуктов в своём магазине, чтобы удовлетворять больше нужд населения. Поэтому он хочет закупить много разнообразного вида продуктов для дальнейшей продажи  и этим самым увеличить свой товарооборот. Для этого он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит для покупки продуктов питания и заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en: Manzar is a young, active fellow of 24. He is still single and does not have any children. But he loves children very much and plans to get married soon. Manzar currently lives with his parents. After graduating from school, Manzar went to a pedagogical institute, graduated, and received his teacher's diploma. He then became a college teacher, where he is still employed. But a teacher's salary is small, and it doesn't pay for a decent place to live. So Manzar started his own small business and wants to expand it gradually, so that it provides a good income for him and his family. He sells food products, and has his own shop. But because Manzar has a job at the college, he can't be at his shop all of the time, and his mother helps him out. Now Manzar wants to increase his shop's assortment of merchandise so he can better meet the needs of his customers. So he wants to buy a lot of many different types of products to increase his sales. To accomplish this, he turned to Arvand and to requesting a loan to buy food products. He thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Idrees

texts.en: Ms Idrees is a 42-year-old married woman doing a business of milk sales for the past 20 years. She put lots of efforts to provide healthy life for her family. She has five adult children. After facing hard time she decided to start her own business. She bought a cow by taking loan from Kashf foundation and sells its milk to the people near her house by going door to door. She needs more money to fulfill the increasing demands of her customers so she requested for a loan Rs. 35,000 to buy one more buffalo to carter more customers. She is her fifth loan cycle with Kashf Foundation; she is already doing fantastic job in her field and hopes to get increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en: Ms Nazia is 29 years old married woman. She has three children; two of them is school going. For the past 05 years, she has been successfully running a business of animals’ sales. She buys animals (baby goats & baby cows) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. Her husband is a labor whose income is on daily basis that is not enough to meet household expenses. That’s why she took initiative and started her own business and now makes enough to contribute to her family’s income. She is very motivated to provide her children a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing. She has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life. It’s her 2nd year in Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business with the support of it. Currently, she requested a loan of Rs. 30,000 to purchase another cow. She hopes get boost in her earnings and wishes to spend the part of profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Byambajargal

texts.en:
Byambajargal is 25 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. He is a blue collar worker at a printing company, which he has been doing since 2010. His wife sells children's clothes by renting stall at a trade center near their home. 

When Byambajargal was a student at the university, he began building his house and in three years he has finished the outer building and currently needs some interior decoration. He is requesting a loan for 6,000,000 MNT, which he will use to purchase vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, iron door, and some insulation materials such as fiberglass, cotton, and gypsum. As a result, he can improve his living condition, reduce his family's use of coal, release less pollutants, and contribute to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase vacuum insulated windows, iron door, and hardwood floors

loans.name: Lizeth

texts.es:
Lizeth es soltera y tiene un hijo de 4 años aun no asiste al colegio, viven en casa de su abuelita materna, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Rio Seco  de la ciudad de El Alto.
Ella estudio hasta el nivel secundario ,ella tiene una pequeña libreria en la cual ofrece a su clientela una gran variedad de utiles escolares ademas regalos y diferentes adornos, la libreria queda ubicada frente a un colegio .
El crédito lo requiere para  adquirir una serie de tarjetas  y regalos ya que se acerca el dia de la madre, asi podra aumentar su capital de trabajo.
El sueño de Lizeth es ampliar su negoxio y tener un bazar completo.
Es la segunda  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la segunda  vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Lizeth is single and has a 4-year-old son who does not yet attend school.  They live in her maternal grandmother's house which is located in the Rio Seco area of the city of El Alto.

Lizeth has a high school level of education.  She has a small bookstore where she offers her customers a wide range of school supplies as well as gifts and decorations.  The store is located opposite a school.

Lizeth needs this loan to buy a series of cards and gifts as Mothers Day is approaching.  This will allow her to increase her working capital. 

Lizeth's dream is to expand her business and have a well-stocked general store.  This is the second time that she has requested a loan from IMPRO and the second from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy Mothers Day (27th of May in Bolivia) cards and gifts to improve her income

loans.name: Justa

texts.en:
Justa is a member of the group called Mujeres Capacitadas, located in the city of Puerto Plata. This is her 12th loan, which she will use to improve her house. She has had her business for around six years. She has paid back all her loans and expanded her business. After her last loan, which she invested in her business, she realized the need to finish building her home structure.

This is the reason why she talked to other members of her group and they recommended her for a housing loan to improve her home by covering the concrete blocks walls with cement, painting them and also to cover the floor with ceramics or tiles and to buy windows and doors. This loan will be used totally to buy all materials to build those areas. Justa is the mother of 4 children and she lives together with them in her unfinished house. 

Esperanza International runs a program for their good clients who are reliable in paying back their loans, who have fulfilled the commitment to grow their business and who have shown fidelity in their groups. This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time as running their business and attending their group meetings.

She thanks God, Esperanza International and all of you for this opportunity. In her name and that of her family, she thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: To buy cement and ceramics, etc.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.en:
Isidro is a member of the group called Mujeres Capacitadas, located in a rural area of the city of Puerto Plata. This is his 11th loan, which he will use to improve his house. He has had his business of selling fruits and vegetables, started from his savings, for over thirty years, and now he is running a grocery or food store.

After his last loan, which he invested in his business, Isidro realized the need to improve his home structure. With this housing loan he is able to take, and with his business profits, he can pay for the home improvements and save for more. The other members of his group are recommending him for a housing loan to start with the house construction. Now he will build his house roof, and build up his deteriorated wood walls with concrete blocks.

Esperanza Internacional runs a program for their good clients who are reliable in paying back their loans, who have fulfilled the commitment to grow their business and who have shown fidelity in their groups. This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time as running their business and attending their group meetings.

Isidro lives together with his long term partner and one of his three children. He thanks God, Esperanza Internacional and all of you for this opportunity. In his name and that of his family, he thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: To buy cement, zinc, wood, concrete blocks, etc.

loans.name: Mwanahamisi

texts.en:
Mwanahamisi lives in the town of Kisauni with her husband and three school-age children. She has a sewing workshop in her home. She takes on jobs from her customers who are located in the market district. Her husband helps her in the business. 

She says that she previously used to sell hens in the market, and her husband worked as a pool attendant, but when the sewing business gradually took off they started working at it full time.

Mwanahamisi is requesting this loan to invest in her sewing workshop. She will buy fabric, threads, buttons and other supplies so that she can continue growing and improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: buy fabric, threads, buttons and other supplies.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a hardworking and enterprising woman who is getting ahead and makes an effort to grow. She says that she has good experience in this area because she has been doing this for a long time. She also says that the previous Kiva loan allowed her to make many improvements and continue to grow. Margaret’s goal is to continue expanding her business.

She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise such as fish for her store so she can continue her sales. She is grateful for this new opportunity.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as fish for her store.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose, 33, owns and is the sole employee of Final Touch Mobile Wash and Detail, a car wash business he began in his hometown of El Paso, Texas.  Though he has only been in business for one month, Jose already has plans to expand his business and hire additional employees.

Knowing he would need extra business assistance, Jose turned to Accion Texas Inc. at one of their many business service workshops in El Paso. 

He applied, and was approved for a $5,450 loan he is using to purchase a truck to enhance the presentation of his mobile car wash and to build local awareness of his business. Jose is happy with his loan and says without it, he would have been hindered in reaching certain business goals.

loans.use: to purchase a truck.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase building materials.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is from Kisauni. She is married and they have children. They live for their children, so they strive to do their best.

Fatuma produces and sells food from home. She says that, thanks to her efforts, he business has been growing and now has a very good clientele. Fatuma wants to be able to improve with each passing day. Both she and her husband are hardworking and enterprising individuals.

Fatuma will use her loan to buy supplies for making her products such as flour, yeast, salt, sugar and other items. These purchases will allow her to continue offering her customers good products like the ones she currently makes.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, salt, sugar and other items to make food products.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence has three children, two of whom attend school.  She is from Kisauni. Florence has a stall in town, where she sells fruits and green vegetables.

Florence is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy mangoes, watermelons, bananas, and vegetables so that she can continue working to meet her goals. Thanks to her work, she is able to help her children finish their studies and pay for all their household needs. She is a dedicated person who has demonstrated that she works hard to meet her obligations.

loans.use: to purchase mangoes, watermelons, bananas, and vegetables

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is married to Charles, who is a businessman. They have three school-aged children.

Margaret buys, packages, and sells hardwood charcoal. At first she used to buy the charcoal already packaged, but she was able to expand their storage area and she can now store up to 15,000 kg of charcoal. She buys bags and polyurethane, packages the charcoal, and sells it to small businesses in the zone. She makes her sales from a small cart. 

She needs this loan to buy charcoal because she is increasing the number of customers and needs to increase the amount of charcoal to meet their demands. 

Her greatest desire is to provide an education for her three children, who attend school, so that she can guarantee them a prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is single, and lives with her parents in Kisauni, Mombasa. She is the daughter of a painter who is very well-known in the area. At a very young age she started helping her parents by buying clothing and other products for resale. She has built up a very good customer base because of her good pricing and variety of products. For this reason, she wants to be able to invest in her business.

She is requesting this loan to purchase shirts, t-shirts, shorts, and other garments because these are in high demand this season. She is grateful for this opportunity, since it will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, t-shirts, shorts, and other garments.

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es:
Ana, solicita un  préstamo porque requiere de mas capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio; este le permitirá comprar un carretón de papitas, jugos, gaseosas, gatorade, golosinas, ropa y artículos de revista; esta inversion le ayudara a obtener más inventario para llevar a cabo su actividad y optimizar los ingresos.
El credito anterior le ayudo a mejorar las condiciones economicas y las circunstancias familiares.
texts.en: Ana is requesting a loan because she needs more working capital in order to continue growing her business. These funds will help her purchase a cart of potato chips, juices, soft drinks, sports drinks, snacks, clothing, and magazines. This investment will help her increase her inventory and continue working and maximizing her income. Her previous loan helped her improve her family's financial conditions and circumstances.

loans.use: purchase a cart of potato chips, juices, soft drinks, sports drinks, snacks, clothing, and magazines.

loans.name: Filomena Gladys

texts.es: La Sra. Filomena tiene 59 años, casada con un hijos que tiene la edad de 18 años,  que se encuentran estudiando en la universidad, ella  se dedica  a la confección de variedad de prendas desde hace ya varios años ella confecciona billeteras  y muñecas de tela en su taller se encuentra en su mismo domicilio que es en la en la zona Mario Mercado,  este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Filomena va a utilizar este préstamo para la  compra de telas para la confección de sus prendas  ya que tiene pedidos que entregar al por mayor a una institución muy conocida que vende juguetes artesanales, educativos y didácticos, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para incremento de capital de inversión,   La Sra. Filomena enfrenta retos en su negocio que son aumentar sus ingresos y va a utilizar los beneficios invirtiendo en la compra de materiales para la confección de sus muñecas y así tener más pedidos de clientes , La Sra. Filomena es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esto le permite mejorar sus ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Filomena is 59 years old and married.  She has an 18 year old son who is studying at the university.  She makes a variety of clothes.  For several years she has been making wallets and dolls from fabric in her workshop.   Her workshop is in her home, which is in the Mario Mercado area.

This loan is her first cycle with the institution.  Filomena will use this loan to buy fabric to make clothes.  She has wholesale orders to deliver to a very well-known institution that sells educational and learning artisan toys.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to increase investment capital.

Filomena faces the challenge in her business of increasing her income.  She will use the profits to buy materials for making her dolls.  This way she will have more customer orders.

Filomena is a very hard-working person.  She is happy and grateful to the institution for the support given.  This allows her to improve her income.

video.title: Kiva Borrower FILOMENA GLADYS  from Bolivia

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale in order to make wallets and dolls.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials (cement, concrete blocks, etc.).

loans.name: Gensia

texts.en:
Gensia makes a living selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour and rice, and thanks to her efforts she has been able to continue with her business. She is a very hardworking woman who is dedicated to her business and to supporting her family. 

Gensia has expanded and improved her overall business as well as the quality of her products. She plans to use the support from this loan to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice and cooking oil. She is very grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice and cooking oil.

loans.name: Suleiman

texts.en:
Suleiman makes a living selling cereals like beans and maize as well as operating a beauty salon business, and thanks to his previous Kiva loan, he has been able to continue with his businesses. He is a very hardworking man who is dedicated to his businesses and to supporting his family.
 
Thanks to his previous loan, Suleiman expanded and improved his business as well as the quality of his products. He plans to use the support from this loan to purchase sacks of beans and maize. He is very grateful for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of beans and maize.

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en:
Melvin J. is from the Dominican Republican. He lives in Laredo, which borders Mexico along the Rio Grande in Texas. There are many different types of Mexican restaurants there, but there were few serving the traditional fried plantain dishes of his home country. Fortunately for Melvin J. and Laredo, his wife is an excellent cook. Together, the couple decided to open a Caribbean restaurant called Restaurant Grandes Ligas last year. 

“We saw an opportunity,” Melvin J. said.

The restaurant is open from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. every day of the week. Melvin J. said he works the front of the restaurant and his wife works the back as the cook. They serve breakfast, lunch and dinner, and offer everything from jelly-filled Cuban breads to licuados de mamay or papaya – tropical fruit smoothies -- for breakfast. In addition to serving mofongo con camaron – fried mashed plantains covered in a shrimp stew – Grandes Ligas serves tacos and other Mexican food.

“People asked for the breakfast tacos, so we offer them,” he said. 

When Melvin J. realized he needed some help with financing the painting and operation of his restaurant, he knew to apply with Accion Texas Inc. One and a half years ago, Melvin J. applied for and received a $500 Accion Texas loan to stock the shelves of another business he owns – a botánica or traditional herbs and medicines store called Yerberia San Miguel. He quickly paid Accion back and knew that doing so would help him build his credit and become eligible for a larger loan.

At his restaurant, Melvin J. said he serves a loyal clientele of people who love his wife’s cooking and the cozy atmosphere dedicated to Major League Baseball. Currently the restaurant employs two people – Melvin J. and his wife – and is large enough for six tables. One day Melvin J. said he would like to expand his restaurant so he can hire more people and serve more customers. For the time being, he is getting known for his international cuisine, one happy stomach at a time.

loans.use: to fund painting and restaurant operation.

loans.name: Natalie

texts.en:
Natalie is the President of Happy 2 Help U Cleaning Service LLC, a cleaning service company for residential and commercial buildings in the greater Los Angeles area, the San Fernando Valley, and the coastal areas of San Diego. Happy 2 Help U promises to deliver exceptional customer service to all of its clients by offering services such as property maintenance and preservation, window washing, power washing, metal fixture polishing, and much more.

In 2005, Natalie left her job at a film and television studio in order to pursue a possible career advancement opportunity. Unfortunately, things fell through and Natalie found herself wondering what would happen. 

“Instead of drowning in uncertainty, I decided it was a good time to start a small business that I could get up and running,” she said.

As a result of her new business endeavor, Happy 2 Help U was born. For eight years now, Natalie has operated from a spare room in her house. She is currently looking to grow and expand her business into her two-car garage. Natalie is looking for a $5,000 loan in order to be able to continue her dream of running her cleaning service business. The funds will be used for Internet advertising and marketing to the local community, and to bring in extra office support.

With a Bachelor’s of Science degree from Cal State Dominguez Hills and over 15 years of experience in the field, Natalie feels that her Happy 2 Help U Cleaning Service is poised for success.

loans.use: To pay for internet advertising and marketing to the local community, and to bring in extra office support.

loans.name: Joeliza

texts.en:
Joeliza is 24 years old, married, and has two children.  She is a native of Doña Josefa, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte  Joeliza.operates a fishing boat business with her husband, which she has been doing for five years.  She earns approximately 40,000 PHP a month.
  
Joeliza is requesting a loan from PMPC, which she will use to purchase fishing supplies.  She has been a member of PMPC for almost three years and maintains a good repayment record.  In the future, Joeliza hopes to have good living conditions and a progressive business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing supplies.

location.town: Sindangan - Doña Josefa, Sindangan, Zamboanga del

loans.name: Kanze

texts.en:
Kanze is a merchant who makes a living buying and selling fish. She has been dedicated to this activity for more than ten years, so she already has some good experience. Kanze has her own boat, nets and fishing equipment, which helps her work without depending on anyone. She is known as a person with a strong desire to move up in life and help her family. 

She is requesting the loan to purchase fish, which will increase her stock since demand is high and she wants to be able to satisfy her customers. Kanze is grateful for the loan she is receiving from Kiva partner Yehu Microfinance because it will be a big help.

loans.use: to purchase fish.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 48 años de edad es una mujer  muy alegre y soñadora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 15, 6 y 3 años respectivamente.El trabajo de Martha  consiste en la venta de comida como pollo frito, hamburguesas, arroz chaufa,  guiso de pollo, entre otros. Realiza esta actividad en el frontis de su casa propia y cada día al atardecer saca sus utensilios como mesas, sillas, platos, cucharas, etc. Se inicio en esta actividad por la necesidad de apoyar a sus hijos en su educación y también tener un empleo  con el cual pueda ayudar en los gastos de su hogar.En el futuro espera construir un local en el interior de su vivienda y poner un restaurante que funcione todo el día,  y generar más ganancias económicas.Este será su préstamo número 06 con Kiva y está contenta de recibir un apoyo financiero que le ayude a incrementar sus ganancias además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.Con el monto solicitado de 600 soles comprará ingredientes como arroz, huevos, condimentos, panes, entre otros productos .
texts.en:
Martha, age 48, is a very happy woman, and she is a dreamer.  She lives in her own house with her husband and their three children, ages 15, 6, and 3.  Martha’s work consists of selling food like fried chicken, hamburgers, fried rice, and chicken stew, among others.

She conducts this business activity in front of her own house.  Each day at sunset she gets out her tools like tables, chairs, plates, and spoons, etc.  She started this business activity from the need to support her children’s education and to have a job with which to help with the household expenses.

In the future she hopes to build a place inside her home and to set up a restaurant to be open all day and to generate more income.

This will be her sixth loan with Kiva.  She is happy to receive financial support that will help her to increase her profits.  Also, she pledges to make her payments punctually.  She will use the requested 600 soles to buy more ingredients like rice, eggs, condiments, and bread, among other products.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like rice, eggs, condiments, and bread, among other products.

loans.name: Lourdes Vanesa

texts.es:
Lourdes, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de mas capital de trabajo para su negocio; este le permitirá comprar diversidad de mercadería para ofrecerle a sus clientes tales como: blusas, camisa, pantalones, chores, overol, entre otros.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a aumentar las ganancias  e incrementar la clienta por la mercadería disponible a su gusto; las circunstancias familiares y las condiciones económicas han mejorado.
texts.en:
Lourdes needs a new loan as she needs more working capital for her business.  This loan will allow her to buy a range of merchandise to offer her customers such as blouses, shirts, pants, shorts, overalls, etc.

Lourdes' previous loan helped her to increase her profits and her number of customers as she had merchandise available to suit their tastes.  Both her family situation and her financial situation have improved.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, pants, shorts, overalls, etc.

loans.name: Tatu

texts.en:
Tatu sells cooked food from her cafe to the general public. She faces the major challenges of seasonality in her business and the lack of enough capital for the continuity of the business.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase foodstuff like maize flour, wheat flour, rice and sugar for her business. She decided to join Yehu get financial assistance to improve her business and she appreciates the support.

loans.use: to purchase foodstuff like maize flour, wheat flour, rice and sugar for her business.

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
Anne is married and has school-age children.  She lives in Kisauni.  Anne has a sewing workshop in her home. She takes on jobs from her customers who are located in the market district. She used to sell clothes in the market but when the sewing business gradually took off she started working  full time.
